objects.text:
• Fresh & Invigorating Scent
• Luxurious Gold Cap Design
• 100ml / 3.4 fl. oz Size

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Invigorating Luxury Fragrance for All
product_details.description:
• Premium unisex eau de toilette suitable for all genders
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size for long-lasting use
• Sleek turquoise bottle design with luxurious gold cap
• Fresh and invigorating scent profile perfect for daily wear
• Modern and sophisticated packaging ideal for gifting
• Professional-grade fragrance from BELLAVITA's luxury collection
• Versatile scent suitable for both day and evening wear
• Travel-friendly size that meets international flight regulations
• Premium quality EDT concentration for optimal longevity
• Contemporary unisex fragrance that breaks traditional boundaries

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a vertically split layout with a modern and elegant aesthetic. The left section has a gradient background transitioning from teal to deep turquoise, adorned with soft circular and wave accents for a refreshing feel. The right section is a clean, light grayish-white to highlight the central product image—a perfume bottle with a gold cap.

Text is strategically arranged in hierarchy. The topmost text (id: "tagline") grabs attention with bold uppercase branding in a golden hue. Below it, in a serif font, the product name (id: "heading") and a succinct subheading (id: "subheading") introduce the fragrance. Midsection features (id: "description") highlight key attributes in bullet points. A sense of urgency is created with a golden-highlighted message (id: "urgency_text") followed by a limited-time note (id: "offer_text"). A bold price (id: "price") reinforces affordability. At the bottom, a CTA button (id: "cta_button") in gold with contrasting dark teal "SHOP NOW" text (id: "cta") invites action, supported by a final encouraging line (id: "call_to_action").

**Color Palette:**
- Teal: `#05a1a1`
- Deep Teal: `#073a45`
- Soft Gold: `#e6c66e`
- Rich Gold: `#9e7e31`
- White: `#ffffff`
- Light Gray: `#f5f5f5`
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant and clean visual aesthetic. The primary color is a bright aqua teal (#00B7B3), giving a refreshing and energetic look that aligns with the "FRESH" branding. This dominant color is smoothly blended with shadowed gradients of a deeper teal (#008C89), adding depth and dimension to the bottle. The text and cap feature a striking metallic gold (#D8BA73), which stands out against the cool background and adds an element of luxury. The subtle white reflections bring balance, enhancing highlights without overpowering. Suggested banner palette: Teal #00B7B3, Deep Teal #008C89, Gold #D8BA73, White #FFFFFF.
